plugin.name: mume_misc
plugin.author: Nick Stockton
plugin.purpose: Misc aliases and triggers that don't belong anywhere else.

trigger.match: ^(?:You grasp the corpse and start dragging it\.|You are already dragging it\!)$
trigger.name: auto_drag_next
trigger.send: if auto_drag then auto_drag_counter = auto_drag_counter + 1 Send(string.format("drag %s.corpse", auto_drag_counter)) else CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "%0") end

trigger.match: ^You do not see anything like that\.$
trigger.name: auto_drag_complete
trigger.send: if auto_drag then CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "Now dragging all corpses.") auto_drag_counter = 1 auto_drag = false else CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "%0") end

trigger.name: handle_prompt
trigger.send: local flags = string.strip(string.format("%s%s%s%s", string.match("%<movement_flags>", "[S]") and "Sneaking " or string.match("%<movement_flags>", "[s]") and "NoSneak " or "", string.match("%<movement_flags>", "[W]") and "Swimming " or "", string.match("%<movement_flags>", "[C]") and "Climbing " or string.match("%<movement_flags>", "[c]") and "Climbing safely " or "", string.match("%<movement_flags>", "[R]") and "Riding " or string.match("%<movement_flags>", "[r]") and "Ridden " or "")) last_prompt = { ["light"] = LIGHT_SYMBOLS["%<light>"] or "Unknown light", ["terrain"] = TERRAIN_SYMBOLS["%<terrain>"] or "Unknown terrain", ["flags"] = flags ~= "" and flags or "No movement flags", ["sneak"] = string.match("%<movement_flags>", "[S]") and "Sneaking" or string.match("%<movement_flags>", "[s]") and "NoSneak" or "Off", ["hp"] = string.split("%<hp>", ":")[2] or "Healthy", ["mp"] = string.split("%<mp>", ":")[2] or "Full", ["mv"] = string.format("%s %s", string.split("%<mv>", ":")[2] or "Rested", string.match("%<movement_flags>", "[R]") and (string.split("%<mount>", ":")[2] or "Rested") or "Not riding"), ["fighting"] = string.format("%s %s", string.split("%<fighting>", ":")[2] or "Unknown", "%<fighting>" ~= "" and string.strip(string.split("%<fighting>", ":")[1]) or "Not fighting"), ["buffer"] = string.format("%s %s", string.split("%<buffer>", ":")[2] or "Unknown", "%<buffer>" ~= "" and string.strip(string.split("%<buffer>", ":")[1]) or "No buffer") } if show_prompt then Note("%<prompt>") end

trigger.match: ^ENEMY.+?:ENEMY (?:utters the word[s]? \'[a-z ]+\'|begins some strange incantations\.\.\.|seems to be blinded\!)$
trigger.name: remove_enemy_tag_exception
trigger.send: -- We're handling the text substitution in another plugin.

trigger.name: translate_country_codes
trigger.send: if country_codes["%<alpha2>"] then CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", string.format("%0 (%s)", country_codes["%<alpha2>"])) else CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "%0") end

trigger.match: You have been idle, and are pulled into a void.
trigger.name: no_void

trigger.match: ^(Nah\.\.\. You feel too relaxed to do that\.|Maybe you should get on your feet first\?|You can\'t do this sitting\!|You can\'t concentrate enough while resting\.|Not from your present position\!)$
trigger.name: auto_stand

trigger.match: ^(?:Prompt set to All|Your prompt will display twiddlers when you are busy)\.$
trigger.name: keep_twiddlers_off

trigger.match: You can only gain one level at a time... Reduced experience.
trigger.name: beep_on_reduced_xp

trigger.match: ^(Welcome to the land of Middle\-earth\. May your visit here be\.\.\. interesting\.|Reconnecting\.)$
trigger.name: do_stuff_after_login
trigger.send: -- Negotiate echo back on. -- If this is not done, command history in MushClient won't work. SendPkt(string.char(255, 253, 1)) Send("change compact on") Send("change spam off") Send("change brief on") Send("change wordwrap off") Send("change prompt all")

alias.name: switch_cloak_from_pouch
alias.send: remove cloak remove fur get cloak pouch wear cloak put cloak pouch put fur pouch

alias.name: switch_fur_from_pack
alias.send: remove cloak remove fur get fur pack wear fur put cloak pack put fur pack

alias.name: Switch_cloak_from_pack
alias.send: remove cloak remove fur get cloak pack wear cloak put cloak pack put fur pack

alias.name: switch_boots_from_pouch
alias.send: remove boots get boots pouch wear boots put boots pouch

alias.name: switch_boots_from_pack
alias.send: remove boots get boots backpack wear boots put boots backpack

muclient.script:
require("mystdlib") json = require("dkjson") COUNTRY_CODES_FILE = string.format("%sdatabases\\country_codes.json", GetInfo(67))
if os.isFile(COUNTRY_CODES_FILE) then fileObj = io.open(COUNTRY_CODES_FILE, "rb") country_codes = json.decode(fileObj:read("*all"), 1, nil) fileObj:close() else country_codes = {} end
TERRAIN_SYMBOLS = { [":"] = "brush", ["O"] = "cavern", ["#"] = "city", ["."] = "field", ["f"] = "forest", ["("] = "hills", ["["] = "indoors", ["<"] = "mountains", ["W"] = "rapids", ["+"] = "road", ["%"] = "shallow water", ["="] = "tunnel", ["U"] = "under water", ["~"] = "water" }
LIGHT_SYMBOLS = { ["@"] = "lit at", ["*"] = "sun light", ["!"] = "artificial light", [")"] = "moon light", ["o"] = "darkness" }
screenReader = "925cdd0331023d9f0b8f05a7" config = "d19a2f0a604c96b7318aa67f" return_code, show_prompt = CallPlugin(config, "get", "show_prompt") auto_drag = false auto_drag_counter = 1 last_prompt = nil
function toggle_show_prompt() show_prompt = not show_prompt CallPlugin(config, "set", "show_prompt", show_prompt) CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", string.format("Show prompt %s.", show_prompt and "on" or "off"), true) end
function speak_prompt(key) if not last_prompt then CallPlugin(screenReader, "say", "No prompt", true) elseif not last_prompt[key] then CallPlugin(screenReader, "say", "Unknown", true) else CallPlugin(screenReader, "say", last_prompt[key], true) end end
